src:
Iwan Bule Tetap Jadi Sestama Lemhanas Meski Terpilih sebagai Ketum PSSI
03 Nov 2019, 19:53 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mochamad Iriawan telah terpilih sebagai ketua umum (ketum) PSSI melalui Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) yang berlangsung di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta Pusat, Sabtu (2/11/2019). Pria yang akrab disapa Iwan Bule ini akan memimpin PSSI hingga 2023.
Meski begitu, Iwan Bule tak akan melepas jabatannya sebagai Sekretaris Utama (Sestama) Lembaga Pertahanan Nasional (Lemhanas). Sebab menurutnya, menjadi Sestama Lemhanas tak sesibuk ketika masih menjabat sebagai Kapolda Metro Jaya sehingga memiliki waktu untuk mengurusi PSSI.
"Kami akan lihat perkembangan soal rangkap jabatan, karena saya pun di Lemhanas tidak seperti di Kapolda," ujar Iwan Bule.
"Jadi, ada waktu untuk saya mencurahkan waktu buat PSSI. Saya akan bisa bagi itu," katanya menambahkan.

Baca halaman berikutnya ya Bolaneters
text:
Iwan Bule Still Becomes First Secretary of National Defense Although Elected as the Chairman of the PSSI
Nov 3, 2019, 19:53 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mochamad Iriawan has been elected as chairman of the PSSI through the Extraordinary Congress (KLB) which took place at the Shangri-La Hotel, Central Jakarta, Saturday (11/2/2019). The man who is familiarly called Iwan Bule will lead PSSI until 2023.
Even so, Iwan Bule will not relinquish his post as First Secretary (Sestama) of the National Defense Institute (Lemhanas). Because according to him, being the First Secretary of National Defense was not as busy as when he was still serving as the Head of Metro Jaya Police, so he had time to deal with PSSI.
"We will see developments in the matter of double occupation, because even I at Lemhanas are not like the Kapolda," said Iwan Bule.
"So, there is time for me to devote time to PSSI. I will be able to share it," he added.

Read the next page, Bolaneters
